    sk = RSA-4096 key
    m = int(message)
    mp, dq = m % sk.q, sk.d % (sk.q - 1)
    mq, dp = m % sk.p, sk.d % (sk.p - 1)
    s1 = pow(mq, dq, sk.q)
    s2 = pow(mp, dp, sk.p)
    h = (sk.u * (s1 - s2)) % sk.q
    s = (s2 + h * sk.p) % sk.n
    return s

sk.u = 1/p mod q

s mod p = s2 mod p = m^(d mod (p-1)) mod p
s mod q = (s2 + h*p) mod q = (s2 + u*p*(s1 - s2)) mod q = s1 mod q = m^(d mod (q-1)) mod q
